00034 class sdb_hashing {
00035 public:
00036         static uint32_t hash_fun(const void* kbuf, const size_t ksize) {
00037                 uint32_t convkey = 0;
00038                 const char* str = (const char*)kbuf;
00039                 for (size_t i = 0; i < ksize; i++)
00040                 convkey = 37*convkey + (uint8_t)*str++;
00041                 return convkey;
00042         }
00043 };
